actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit the payment of benefits to a married couple on their combined earnings record where that method of computation produces a higher combined effort.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides, under title II of the Social Security Act (Old Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance), that the payment of benefits to a married couple shall be made on the basis of their combined earnings record where that method of computation products a higher combined benefit. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 402)

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit the payment of benefits to a married couple on their combined earnings record where that method of computation produces a higher combined effort.
